name: tango.vim
description:
Based on the Tango color palette.	
The background is white by default, to have a really full Tango colorscheme put this in your .vimrc file:

let g:bg_tango = 1

Screenshots: 
C - http://www.focolivre.org/arquivos/tango_vim.png
Python - http://www.focolivre.org/arquivos/tango_vim1.png
Perl - http://www.focolivre.org/arquivos/tango_vim2.png

To more about the Tango Project: http://tango.freedesktop.org
For suggestions or any other thing, feel free to email me.
install_details: Just copy the file to your .vim/colors folder.
